name: Schlachtfeld
overview: A German language strategy game for 1-4 players, however knowledge of German is only necessary for the instructions and for a few screen-texts. According to the author's text document it is a cross between Battleforce and BattleIsle and has been written in AMOS (The Creator) by Peter Weigoldt. Multiple updates for this game came out with version 2.15 coming out in 2000 and a conversion to C from AMOS in 2004.
